title: Jerry Douglas' Tribute To Bluegrass Legends Lester Flatt And Earl Scruggs
teaser: Jerry Douglas, considered by many to be the best dobro player in the world, brings his instrument to the studio and talks about his new album, The Earls of Leceister, a tribute to Flatt and Scruggs.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
